DOC.brief_title: Gum Chewing And Bowel Motility Patients Undergoing Cesarean Section . Kasr el Ainy Experience
DOC.detailed_description: This study Will Be conduct 162 Patients Undergoing caesarean section The Obstetrics & Gynecology Department `` kasr el ainy teach hospital '' . Methods : Women Were Randomized Two Groups : Group A ( 81 Women ) Who Received One Stick Sugarless Gum ( Samara food & Chocolates Product Company ) '' S.A.E . '' , 15 Minutes Every 2 hour After Surgery Tell Defecation , Group B ( 81 Women ) Traditional Management ( Oral Intake Clear Fluid Allowed After Passage Flatus Regular Diet With The Passage Bowel Movement . Each Women Both Groups Was Examined Abdominal Using A Stethoscope Detect The Intestinal Movement Every 4 Hours And Asked Report Immediately The Time Either Passing Flatus stool .
